resources.string:
OpenClaw Node Automation Service
This service allows OpenClaw AI assistant to control your device for automation tasks: • Tap, swipe, and other gestures • Retrieve screen information • Input text • Take screenshots
Before using this service, please ensure: 1. You have connected to the Gateway in the OpenClaw Node app 2. You understand the actions AI will perform
This service does not collect or upload any of your data.
